{"step_by_step_thinking": "Jersey finger is a traumatic rupture of the flexor digitorum profundus (FDP) tendon at its point of attachment to the distal phalanx. Document [5] also mentions that jersey finger is an avulsion of the flexor digitorum profundus tendon (FDP) from its distal insertion on the distal phalanx. Therefore, the correct answer is B.
